name: Genuine Innovations Genuine Innovations Tubeless Tackle Tire Plug
categories: Genuine Innovations Tubeless Tackle Tire Plug
description: Some punctures in tubeless tires are just too big for sealant. This tubeless tackle kit is the solution to avoid unwanted hike-a-bike missions. The compact case has all the tools you need to patch that hole and keep on riding.Compact case has an integrated plug insertion tool and a presta valve core removal tool.Includes 5 tubeless repair plugs and 2 presta valve cores.
